trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Norixius can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Living Shadow
entries: While in dim light or darkness, Norixius has resistance to damage that isnâ€™t force, psychic, or radiant.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, Norixius can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadow Step
entries: While in dim light or darkness, as a bonus action the dragon can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the dragon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Norixius fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Norixius can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 ({@dice 2d10+4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@dice 1d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Norixius's choice that is within 120 feet of Norixius and aware of it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of her turns, ending the effect on herelf on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Norixius's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Norixius exhales acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@dice 5d8}) acid damage and 22 ({@dice 5d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Norixius beats her wings. Each creature within 10 feet of Norixius must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Norixius can then fly up to half her flying speed.
